articles.title: BSE shares slump 6% as positive Q1 earnings trigger rush to book profits - Moneycontrol
articles.description: BSE's stake sale in affiliate CDSL sharply boosted its net profit numbers to register a 11x growth in April-June. However, excluding the expectational item also BSE's net profit still grew 82 percent on year.
articles.content:
Shares of BSE Ltd slumped over 6 percent in early trade on August 10 as investors took the company's positive earnings for the April-June quarter as an opportunity to book partial profits.

articles.title: Sebi halves time period to list shares after IPO closure. Details - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Shares can now be listed on the third (T+3) day from the date of closure (T) of an IPO, instead of the existing six (T+6) days.
